ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: RE: Class balance
ygData.msgSnippet: In the Plane of Fear last night I got the Death Touch from Cazic Thule three times; bards are his favorite.  A magician in my guild that seems to get DT d a
ygData.messageBody:
In the Plane of Fear last night I got the Death Touch from Cazic Thule three
times; bards are his favorite. A magician in my guild that seems to get
DT'd a lot (five times one night) saw me online last night and said in
/guildsay "Crier get your ass up to Fear so that CT will quit DTing me." Oh
joy.

Anyhow... After the third DT I said "Geez, I should petition a name change
do Dier."

[48 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> How about Deadbard? wait that would be too confusing with my
> usual nickname
> in the guild, "Oh look, here comes that Deadbard guy again, shall
> we invite
> him in as another meat shield?"
>
> Kit
